name: 911 Carrera
description: Iconic rear-engined sports car with sharp handling and daily usability.
longdescription: The Porsche 911 Carrera combines legendary rear-engine dynamics with everyday usability. Its 3.0L Twin-Turbo Flat-6 engine delivers 385 HP, accelerating from 0-100 km/h in 4.2 seconds. PASM suspension and Sport Chrono enhance driving precision, while lightweight wheels improve agility. Ideal for spirited driving or daily commuting, the 911 Carrera balances performance, comfort, and style.
features-description: Sport Chrono enhances throttle response and includes launch control for maximum performance.
Porsche Active Suspension Management (PASM) adjusts damping for comfort or sportiness.
Lightweight wheels reduce unsprung mass, improving handling and steering precision.

name: Huracán EVO
description: Mid-engine V10 supercar focused on raw performance and dramatic design.
longdescription: The Lamborghini Huracán EVO is a high-performance mid-engine V10 supercar that fuses extreme speed with aerodynamic mastery. Producing 630 HP and 600 Nm of torque, it rockets from 0-100 km/h in just 2.9 seconds. The ALA aerodynamic system dynamically adjusts downforce, while LDVI predicts driver inputs to optimize handling. Optional carbon fiber interiors enhance a lightweight, race-inspired cabin.
features-description: Aerodinamica Lamborghini Attiva (ALA) dynamically adjusts downforce for optimal cornering.
LDVI (Lamborghini Dinamica Veicolo Integrata) predicts driver intent to optimize handling.
Optional carbon fiber interior trim enhances lightweight performance and racing aesthetics.

name: GTC4Lusso
description: Four-seat GT blending long-distance comfort with Ferrari performance.
longdescription: Ferrari’s GTC4Lusso is a four-seat grand tourer that combines luxury, comfort, and extraordinary performance. Its 6.3L V12 engine delivers 680 HP and 697 Nm of torque, achieving 0-100 km/h in 3.4 seconds. Adaptive suspension ensures smooth, confident handling, while a luxurious leather interior provides the perfect environment for long-distance touring with style.
features-description: Spacious four-seat configuration suitable for grand touring with passengers.
Adaptive suspension continuously adjusts damping for comfort or sport driving.
Sumptuous leather upholstery hand-stitched by Ferrari’s artisans.

name: S-Class Coupe
description: Refined coupe offering luxury appointments and smooth grand cruising.
longdescription: The Mercedes-Benz S-Class Coupe offers unmatched luxury, combining elegant design with cutting-edge technology. Its 4.0L Twin-Turbo V8 produces 469 HP and 700 Nm of torque, with smooth RWD performance and 9-speed automatic transmission. Nappa leather, Burmester audio, and AIRMATIC air suspension create a serene cabin, making every journey a refined experience.
features-description: Soft Nappa leather covers seats and trim for exceptional comfort.
AIRMATIC air suspension provides a smooth, controlled ride over any surface.
Burmester premium audio system delivers studio-quality acoustics.

name: Bentayga
description: Opulent luxury SUV with powerful performance and handcrafted interior.
longdescription: The Bentley Bentayga is a luxury SUV that blends high performance with exceptional comfort. Its 4.0L Twin-Turbo V8 generates 542 HP and 770 Nm of torque, accelerating to 100 km/h in 4.5 seconds. Hand-stitched leather, adaptive air suspension, and rear-seat luxury features ensure that every journey is indulgent, while AWD capability delivers confidence on all terrains.
features-description: Cabin surfaces are wrapped in hand-stitched full-grain leather.
Adaptive air suspension balances comfort and control across terrains.
Rear-seat luxury package adds extra legroom, ventilation, and entertainment.

name: Panamera Turbo
description: High-performance four-door GT mixing sportscar dynamics with luxury.
longdescription: The Porsche Panamera Turbo is a four-door GT delivering a thrilling mix of sports car performance and luxury. Its 4.0L Twin-Turbo V8 produces 550 HP and 770 Nm of torque, reaching 0-100 km/h in 3.8 seconds. Adaptive air suspension, sport seats, and rear-axle steering ensure precise handling, making it equally suited for long-distance comfort and high-speed excitement.
features-description: Adaptive air suspension adjusts height and stiffness for comfort or sport.
Sport seats offer enhanced lateral support during spirited driving.
Rear-axle steering improves maneuverability and stability at speed.

name: 911 Turbo S
description: Top-tier 911 with extraordinary acceleration and refined tech.
longdescription: The Porsche 911 Turbo S is the ultimate 911, offering blistering acceleration and refined technology. Powered by a 3.8L Twin-Turbo Flat-6 producing 640 HP, it sprints to 100 km/h in just 2.7 seconds. Active aerodynamics, carbon-ceramic brakes, and sport seats maximize driving precision and comfort, making it an exhilarating experience on both track and road.
features-description: Active aerodynamic flaps and spoilers enhance grip and stability dynamically.
Carbon-ceramic brakes deliver fade-free stopping performance under extreme conditions.
Sport seats provide precision control and long-distance comfort.

name: Aventador SVJ
description: Extreme V12 supercar focused on track-capable performance and aerodynamics.
longdescription: The Lamborghini Aventador SVJ is a V12 supercar designed for maximum track performance. Its 6.5L naturally aspirated engine produces 770 HP, accelerating to 100 km/h in 2.8 seconds. Advanced aerodynamics, lightweight forged wheels, and race-spec seats ensure precise handling and stability, offering an uncompromising supercar experience for thrill-seekers.
features-description: Advanced aerodynamic kit increases downforce for better cornering grip.
Forged wheels reduce rotational mass for faster acceleration and braking.
Fixed carbon-fiber race seats provide maximum driver support on track.

name: Roma
description: Elegant two-seater GT with a focus on grand touring and sophisticated design.
longdescription: The Ferrari Roma is an elegant two-seater GT that combines sophisticated design with impressive performance. Its 3.9L Twin-Turbo V8 produces 612 HP and 760 Nm of torque, achieving 0-100 km/h in 3.4 seconds. With premium leather, advanced infotainment, and balanced suspension tuning, the Roma delivers both comfort and exhilarating driving pleasure for long-distance journeys.
features-description: Designed for long-distance comfort with balanced suspension tuning.
Cabin wrapped in top-grade Italian leather with handcrafted detailing.
High-resolution infotainment system integrates navigation and connectivity.

name: AMG GT R Pro
description: Performance-focused coupe with track-tuned dynamics and luxury finishes.
longdescription: The Mercedes-AMG GT R Pro is a track-oriented luxury coupe built for precision and speed. Its 4.0L Twin-Turbo V8 delivers 577 HP, reaching 100 km/h in 3.6 seconds. With manually adjustable suspension, performance aero, and track-focused components, it combines race-ready dynamics with premium AMG luxury, providing an exhilarating driving experience.
features-description: Track package includes roll cage, lightweight components, and telemetry tools.
Manually adjustable coilover suspension fine-tunes handling precision.
Active aerodynamic aids improve high-speed stability and cornering.

name: Continental GT
description: Handcrafted grand tourer combining wild power with sumptuous luxury.
longdescription: The Bentley Continental GT is a handcrafted grand tourer that blends immense power with exquisite luxury. Its 6.0L Twin-Turbo W12 engine produces 626 HP and 900 Nm of torque, hitting 100 km/h in 3.7 seconds. The cabin features premium leather, wood, and metal detailing, while adaptive chassis and premium sound systems ensure a sublime driving experience on both highways and winding roads.
features-description: Interior handcrafted with fine leather, wood, and metal detailing.
Adaptive chassis continuously monitors and adjusts ride dynamics.
High-end sound system delivers rich, immersive in-cabin acoustics.
